attributes.action: invest in research to deafness and a possible cure.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Worldwide governments have banned or restricted some important research into illness and disability without any foundation other than being seen to be politically correct. Would have penicillin ever been found in this day and age? I would like to see investment into research relating to deafness instead of the forced introduction of digital hearing aids which have been adopted as a "one solution fits all" by some NHS practices.
